name: Okta POC Account Cleanup
title: Okta POC Account Cleanup
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IAM/pages/1293746546 - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Table of Contents

    • Resources to Delete
      • Identity Provider
        • Routing Rules
        • Authentication - Password Policies
        • Authentication - Sign On Policies
        • MFA Factor Enrollment
        • Administrators
        • Tokens
        • Trusted Origins
        • Groups

Resources to Delete

Where possible, the resources which are marked for deletion are set to inactive.
After checking all resources, all inactive ones will be deleted

Identity Provider

Name

Reason

Note

questback ADFS 123

Not in use

Duplicate of “Questback ADFS” IdP


questback Azure Active Directory

Not in use

Duplicate of “Questback AD - OpenID Connect” IdP

Routing Rules

Name

Reason

Note

ADFS TEST

Not in use, only suited for a specific test case

Can be easily recreated if needed

ADFS TEST OLIVER

Not in use, only suited for a specific test case

Can be easily recreated if needed

Authentication - Password Policies

Name

Reason

Note

questback string password

disabled anyway

only used once for testing ?

Legacy Policy

disabled anyway

ALSO REMOVE IN PROD ?

Strong Passwords

disabled anyway

only used once for testing ?

Authentication - Sign On Policies

Name

Reason

Note

MFA for TKA

disabled anyway

Needed from QA side?

Questback Signon Policy

disabled anyway

Very old policy - only used for the group Questback Employees - MFA is enabled

MFATechEnablement

disabled anyway

not needed anymore since TechEnablement is done - Only used for the group MFATechEnablement which is not managed anymore

markus MFA test

used for manual testing

can it be deleted ?

Yes. If I need something like that again I will recreate it with a proper naming.

MFA Factor Enrollment

Name

Reason

Note

Markus MFA Test

only a test

cleanup

iam-tka test

only a test

cleanup

Questback MFA Rule

disabled anyway

Needed from QA side ?

MFATechnEnablement

disabled anyway

only used for Tech Enablement

Note: Also disabled the Security Question Factor, as it will not be in use in Production

Administrators

Vitaliy Siciliano - Does not need admin rights in our account

okta_users_crud@3uu.eu okta_users_crud@3uu.eu (email: okta_users_crud@3uu.eu okta)
I will remove this user’s admin rights, if there is not a good reason for it

Reason

Posts

Rene

  • Only used on the creation day

  • will expire in a few days anyways

Note: Most tokens are not created by the API user
